name: Natalie Jill
event_details: Does speaking at others' events - has speaker deck. No evidence of own branded live event
qualification_notes: PERFECT FIT. Massive audience. Sells high-ticket. Does speaking but not own branded live event. Ready for ESA to build her event infrastructure. Est $1-3M revenue.

name: Amber Lilyestrom
event_details: Has hosted 500-person live events and sold multiple six-figures from stage. Sold six-figures from stage
qualification_notes: STRONG FIT. Already proven event capacity but could scale with ESA. 7-figure business. Forbes featured. Needs event scaling infrastructure.

name: Sohee Carpenter
backend_offer: Year of Strength programs + 1:1 coaching + digital programs
event_details: No evidence of live events. PhD in Sports Science. Women's Health advisor since 2018
qualification_notes: GREAT FIT. Massive engaged audience. Academic credibility. Sells programs but no live events. Would benefit hugely from ESA event infrastructure. Est $500K-1.5M.

name: Chalene Johnson
backend_offer: InstaClubHub membership + Phase It Up health program + courses + PUSH Journal
event_details: Has 2 podcasts (The Chalene Show + Build Your Tribe). Sells courses/memberships. Was Beachbody star. No major branded conference
qualification_notes: STRONG FIT but may be too large. Multi-million dollar brand. Has the audience for massive events but not doing them. Would need premium ESA package.

name: Dr. Mariza Snyder
event_details: Has ENERGIZED podcast. Sells through online store. Featured in Fox/HuffPo/MBG. No evidence of own branded conference or retreat
qualification_notes: GREAT FIT. Health expert with loyal audience. Podcast listeners convert well to events. Products + courses = proven buyer audience. Est $1-2M revenue.

name: She Works HIS Way
backend_offer: Patreon ($10-20/mo) + workshops + courses + digital downloads + live events + books + planner
event_details: Has live events category on site. Sells workshops/courses. 10yr old community. Podcast on all platforms. Patreon community
qualification_notes: STRONG FIT. Faith-based women's community ready to scale events. Already does small events - needs ESA to go bigger. Built-in congregation-style audience.

name: Bree Argetsinger
backend_offer: Digital fitness programs + meal plans + challenges
event_details: No evidence of live events or retreats. Purely digital business model
qualification_notes: GREAT FIT. Large engaged fitness audience. All digital - no events. CHEK certified coach. Community already exists. Perfect candidate for first branded retreat or fitness conference.

name: Ashlie Molstad
event_details: No evidence of live events. Based in Phoenix AZ. Self-described seven figure health coach turned life coach
qualification_notes: GREAT FIT. Seven-figure earner with passionate women's community. No events. Phoenix-based = great event market. Podcast audience = warm leads for events.

name: Katie Sonier
does_events: TWK Membership + 1:1 coaching + Melbourne group training + mindset coaching
event_details: Small local only
qualification_notes: Melbourne group training only. No major events or retreats
column15: GOOD FIT. Has membership + coaching model. Does local training. Could expand to fitness retreats/events. Engaged community through #TWK.

name: Melissa Ambrosini
backend_offer: Books + podcast (The Melissa Ambrosini Show) + courses + speaking
event_details: Bestselling author. Big podcast. Does speaking gigs but doesn't host own major conference
qualification_notes: STRONG FIT. Huge audience. Bestselling author. Podcast = built-in promotion. Does speaking but no own branded event. Australia-based but US market potential. Est $1-3M.

name: Revivalist Ministries
backend_offer: Events + podcast (Sound of Revival) + worship + summer missions
event_details: Has events page. Does summer missions. Based in Tryon NC (844 Georgia Cliff Road 28782)
qualification_notes: GOOD FIT. Faith-based ministry already doing events. Has physical address + phone. Could scale events significantly with ESA marketing infrastructure.

name: Lauren Gleisberg
backend_offer: Digital workout plans + meal plans + community
event_details: Community-focused but all digital. PDF-based fitness plans. Facebook/Pinterest/Instagram presence
qualification_notes: GOOD FIT. Large women's fitness community. All digital product sales. No events. Could launch fitness retreats or transformation events.

name: Greg O'Gallagher
backend_offer: Supplement stacks ($48-148) + training app + transformation programs
event_details: Primarily e-commerce supplements + app. No live events or retreats. YouTube-first brand
qualification_notes: INTERESTING FIT. Massive male fitness audience. Supplements + programs = proven buyers. No events at all. Could do fitness transformation weekends or mens health summits.

name: Mind Pump Media
backend_offer: MAPS fitness programs (30+ programs $50-200+) + fitness coaching + supplements
event_details: Massive podcast. 30+ digital training programs. No live events or conferences
qualification_notes: STRONG FIT. Huge podcast audience. 30+ products = proven buyers. No live events. Would be ideal for a fitness education summit/conference. May be too large - est $5M+.

name: Kourtney Thomas
event_details: No
qualification_notes: Helps women move mountains. Free discovery calls. Smaller audience but very engaged, personal brand
column15: RISING STAR. Smaller but targeted women's coaching. Could do intimate retreats/workshops. Needs to build event muscle. Good long-term ESA prospect.

name: Propel Women
does_events: Podcast (Life and Leadership) + articles + daily inspiration + events
event_details: Yes
qualification_notes: Connected to A21 and Zoe Churches. Christine Caine founded it. Does Global Freedom Summit (hybrid)
column15: COULD BE TOO LARGE. Christine Caine is a big name. But Propel Women itself could use ESA for scaling their hybrid events. Faith + women's leadership = perfect vertical.

name: Tori Gordon
event_details: No
qualification_notes: Private advisor positioning. Likely high-ticket 1:1 only
column15: RISING STAR. Soul-led leaders niche. High-ticket coaching. Small but devoted audience. Could launch intimate masterminds/retreats.

name: Katie Wells
backend_offer: Blog + podcast (Wellness Mama Podcast) + resources + courses
event_details: Massive blog. Top health podcast. Resources page. No own branded live events or conferences
qualification_notes: STRONG FIT. Enormous mom audience. Top health podcast. Proven community. Zero live events. Would be incredible conference/summit host with ESA.

name: Faithful Girl Fitness
event_details: No
qualification_notes: Very niche - intersection of faith and fitness. Small operation
column15: RISING STAR. Perfect niche for ESA - faith + fitness combo. Smaller but exactly the type who needs ESA to launch their first faith-fitness retreat.

name: Jasmine Star
backend_offer: Speaking + podcast + business coaching + social media strategy
event_details: 8-figure business. Top 1% podcast. Speaks at conferences. Founded tech company
qualification_notes: LIKELY TOO LARGE but exceptional referral source. Already does speaking. Could partner on events. Connected to Brendon Burchard/Ed Mylett/Lewis Howes network.

name: Bodylura (FitBody)
does_events: 12 fitness programs + custom meal plans + community + app membership
event_details: No
qualification_notes: App-based fitness. 7-day free trial model. Strength training + fat burning focus
column15: GOOD FIT. App-based fitness with community. No events. Could do transformation challenges as live events. Subscription model = recurring buyer base.

name: Shannon Miller
does_events: Speaking + health advocacy + cancer survivor platform
event_details: Speaker only
qualification_notes: 7-time Olympic gymnast. Cancer survivor. Does speaking. No own branded events
column15: INTERESTING FIT. Olympic credibility. Cancer survivor story. Does speaking but no own events. Could launch women's health/empowerment conference.

name: Christine Caine
backend_offer: A21 (anti-trafficking) + Propel Women + Zoe Churches + books + podcast + TV
event_details: Does Global Freedom Summit (hybrid). Multiple organizations. 30+ year ministry
qualification_notes: MAY BE TOO LARGE. But her sub-organizations (A21/Propel) could each use ESA for event scaling. Good referral or partnership opportunity.

name: Katrina Scott
does_events: Tone It Up app + nutrition plans + community + supplements
event_details: Retreats historically
qualification_notes: Co-founded Tone It Up. Has done retreats in past. Brand pivoting post-Tone It Up era
column15: WORTH EXPLORING. Has done retreats before but brand in transition. If launching new solo venture would need ESA for events.

name: Autumn Calabrese
does_events: Beachbody/BODi programs (21 Day Fix) + cookbook + portion control
event_details: No own events
qualification_notes: Beachbody super trainer. 21 Day Fix creator. Cookbook author
column15: INTERESTING but tied to BODi/Beachbody. If transitioning to independent brand would be perfect for ESA. Massive audience with no own events.

name: Jordan Lee Dooley
does_events: Books (Own Your Everyday) + podcast + courses + coaching
event_details: Small events
qualification_notes: Bestselling author. Podcast host. Faith-based purposeful living. Has done some workshops
column15: STRONG FIT. Faith-based women's empowerment. Bestselling author = built-in audience. Podcast. Does small workshops - needs ESA to scale to conferences.

name: Heidi Powell
does_events: Transform app + coaching + media personality (Extreme Weight Loss)
event_details: No own events
qualification_notes: TV personality. Transform app. Major transformation brand. No own branded conference
column15: STRONG FIT. Massive TV-built audience. Transformation brand perfect for live events. No own conferences despite huge name recognition.

name: Kayla Itsines
event_details: No
qualification_notes: Sold SWEAT app. Now independent. No own live events or conferences
column15: LIKELY TOO LARGE. 16M followers. But post-SWEAT sale could be launching new ventures. If going independent would need event infrastructure.

name: Rachael DeVaux
does_events: Meal plans + workout programs + nutrition coaching
event_details: No
qualification_notes: Registered dietitian. Large YouTube + Instagram. All digital products
column15: GOOD FIT. Large health/nutrition audience. No events. Dietitian credibility. Could do wellness retreats or nutrition transformation events.

name: Michelle Myers
backend_offer: Community + workshops + Patreon + books + live events + podcast
event_details: Founded SWHW ~10 years ago. Does small live events. 4 friends started on Google Hangout. Instagram-first growth
qualification_notes: INDIVIDUAL PROSPECT separate from SWHW brand. Faith-based women's business leader. Personal brand + org brand could both host events. Needs ESA to scale.
